__e: First, gather our old comrades. Send them a sign.
Well, who knows, we might become, you know, pals, et cetera.
Don't forget you just shot one of their beloved comrades, and they'll be a little bit touchy about that.
It could jeopardize my comrades who depend upon me.
Those are your brethren out there, old man, not mine.
Good buddies sharing a special moment. Don't say anything, Ron.
Uh, I've got some good mates back in England and, of course, some great ones here, too. So, lots of choices.
